Air New Zealand flight to Papeete, Tahiti hit by lightning strike, returns to Auckland https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-flight-to-papeete-tahiti-hit-by-lightning-strike-returns-to-auckland/7GX6DHFFUZAZJLNXRMVQYU6QPU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-flight-to-papeete-tahiti-hit-by-lightning-strike-returns-to-auckland/7GX6DHFFUZAZJLNXRMVQYU6QPU/ The plane was hit by lightning 20 minutes after takeoff. Mon, 09 Dec 2024 17:47:28 +0000 Air New Zealand flight NZ902 from Auckland to Papeete, Tahiti, was forced to turn around after the plane was struck by lightning 20 minutes after takeoff.
From paramedic to doctor: Father of seven Carlton Irving graduates with a Bachelor of Medicine & Surgery https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/from-paramedic-to-doctor-father-of-seven-carlton-irving-graduates-with-a-bachelor-of-medicine-surgery/CMP6Q7JUB5F6JBXHFZB6LAG7PI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/kahu/from-paramedic-to-doctor-father-of-seven-carlton-irving-graduates-with-a-bachelor-of-medicine-surgery/CMP6Q7JUB5F6JBXHFZB6LAG7PI/ Carlton Irving graduates from Otago Medical School, pushes 'pure work ethic'. Mon, 09 Dec 2024 17:33:45 +0000 Carlton Irving (centre), who graduated with an MB ChB celebrates his achievement with his whānau (from left) father Peter, wife Jaime, mother Moana and aunty Hemaima Hughes.
PM Christopher Luxon adamant bootcamp pilot not a failure, hints at changes after youths absconded https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-adamant-bootcamp-pilot-not-a-failure-hints-at-changes-after-youths-absconded/37HROMIWQRFOHN7GSHUGNK3G3U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/politics/pm-christopher-luxon-adamant-bootcamp-pilot-not-a-failure-hints-at-changes-after-youths-absconded/37HROMIWQRFOHN7GSHUGNK3G3U/ Adam PearseTwo participants who absconded have been arrested after going missing for days. Mon, 09 Dec 2024 17:24:04 +0000 One of the bootcamp participants died in a crash involving a car and bus near Tirau which left 13 others injured. New data shows the teen was driving one of the vehicles.
